title: Guys, they're nerfing WW
body:
Enough with the "NERF WW!" threads and what not.
Check surrender@20.
Making 20 topics a day over a topic already being addressed doesn't improve the chance of somethig being done.

Make a dedicated topic, its more productive and more likely to be viewed.

replies.body: They intend to turn him into a tank. Q does way too much damage and he doesn't have a Braum passive yet.

> They intend to turn him into a tank. Q does way too much damage and he doesn't have a Braum passive yet.

Not really....its percent health damage and he doesn't really build AP.
This is the 3rd straight insane nerf he got.....
